config-param.name: postprocessorJS
entitymetadata
config-param.value:
{"dml":false,"query":"WITH user_info AS (
 SELECT 
 u.suspended,
 u.user_type,
 u.user_id
 FROM users u
 LEFT JOIN users_security_deposit usd ON usd.user_id = u.user_id
 WHERE u.suspended = 0 
 AND u.job_title LIKE '%buyer%'
 AND u.user_id = @user_id_1
),
bidding_info AS (
 SELECT 
 usd.allowed_bidding,
 usd.user_id,
 (usd.max_bid - COALESCE(MAX(ad.bid_amount), 0)) AS credit_limit,
 usd.deposit_amount AS deposite_value,
 usd.max_bid AS deposite_limit,
 MAX(ad.bid_amount) AS vechile_max_bid,
 CASE 
 WHEN usd.max_bid > 0 THEN 1
 ELSE 0
 END AS has_security_dep
 FROM users_security_deposit usd
 LEFT JOIN auction_bidding ad ON ad.bid_by = usd.user_id AND ad.is_approved = 0
 WHERE usd.user_id = @user_id_2
 GROUP BY usd.user_id, usd.deposit_amount, usd.max_bid,usd.allowed_bidding
)
SELECT 
 bi.allowed_bidding,
 ui.suspended,
 ui.user_type,
 ui.user_id,
 bi.deposite_value,
 bi.deposite_limit,
 bi.has_security_dep,
 bi.credit_limit,
 bi.deposite_value AS bidding_deposite_value,
 bi.deposite_limit AS bidding_deposite_limit,
 bi.vechile_max_bid,
 cast(@user_bidded_vehicle_amount as DECIMAL(18,2)) + cast(@user_bidded_vehicle_hike as DECIMAL(18,2)) as user_vehcile_total_bidded_amount
FROM user_info ui
LEFT JOIN bidding_info bi ON ui.user_id = bi.user_id;","overloadPosition":0,"serviceInput":[{"type":"STRING","name":"user_bidded_vehicle_hike","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"user_id_2","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"user_id_1","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"user_bidded_vehicle_amount","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"}],"serviceOutput":[],"name":"CustomQuery","schemaName":"dbo","serviceType":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.CustomQueryMetadata"}

config-param.name: customQuery
config-param.value: WITH user_info AS ( SELECT u.suspended, u.user_type, u.user_id FROM users u LEFT JOIN users_security_deposit usd ON usd.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.suspended = 0 AND u.job_title LIKE '%buyer%' AND u.user_id = @user_id_1 ), bidding_info AS ( SELECT usd.allowed_bidding, usd.user_id, (usd.max_bid - COALESCE(MAX(ad.bid_amount), 0)) AS credit_limit, usd.deposit_amount AS deposite_value, usd.max_bid AS deposite_limit, MAX(ad.bid_amount) AS vechile_max_bid, CASE WHEN usd.max_bid > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS has_security_dep FROM users_security_deposit usd LEFT JOIN auction_bidding ad ON ad.bid_by = usd.user_id AND ad.is_approved = 0 WHERE usd.user_id = @user_id_2 GROUP BY usd.user_id, usd.deposit_amount, usd.max_bid,usd.allowed_bidding ) SELECT bi.allowed_bidding, ui.suspended, ui.user_type, ui.user_id, bi.deposite_value, bi.deposite_limit, bi.has_security_dep, bi.credit_limit, bi.deposite_value AS bidding_deposite_value, bi.deposite_limit AS bidding_deposite_limit, bi.vechile_max_bid, cast(@user_bidded_vehicle_amount as DECIMAL(18,2)) + cast(@user_bidded_vehicle_hike as DECIMAL(18,2)) as user_vehcile_total_bidded_amount FROM user_info ui LEFT JOIN bidding_info bi ON ui.user_id = bi.user_id;
